title: So let me get this straight. You made dynamic queues so people wouldn't have to abandon friends
body:
but you deleted team ranked which allowed friends of any elo to play ranked together, and in dynamic queues friends whose ranks are too far apart are not allowed to queue with eachother.

http://i.imgur.com/caur46l.gif

replies.body:
From what I read on this thread: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/HGblb9fH-the-2016-ranked-season-updates-on-dynamic-ranked-and-your-feedback
They're going to re-integrate ranked 5s at some point into the queue system, they just had to change plans because they're rolling out a dedicated soloq ASAP, which was a last-minute change.

Or they could, you know...

Not have the idiotic fucking dynamic queue that's completely counter-intuitive.  I stopped playing HotS for several reasons - one of them being because I got really tired of being the one solo player on a team with a 4-man pre-made.  Welcome to being basically an entirely separate entity from the rest of the game - you've at that point practically become a single player team thanks to the 4-man not communicating, helping, or even acknowledging you up until they appear to be losing.  Then welcome to Blameville.

Just... fuck dynamic queue.  So hard.

They are giving you the queue you wanted, now is the time to say thank you.  Unless you are afraid of not having enough people in the soloq ranked and having long queue times, I see no reason for you to be upset.
Probably because this is one of the players who didn't want dynamic queue? Like those exist too?

So what if they exist. That doesn't mean it suddenly makes sense to complain about a queue that you don't have to use being there.... unless no one wants to play the pure soloq but from the amount of complaining I've seen on the boards there better be people who use it or boards is just full of hot air.

Except what OP has been using team ranked for was to play ranked with friends who are in completely different ranks. Since team ranked was taken now, OP no longer has this option, and Dynamic Queue does not fully replace it because there are still rank restrictions. 
Not complaining about having to use the queue, but the fact that he/she can no longer use any of the queues for their original purposes. More importantly, you're making assumptions and assigning an opinion to an individual based on a group response.

Thank you for an intelligent and well stated response. Yes the issue is not just complaining about one queue when another can do the same thing. You literally cannot play silvers and plats on one dynamic queue ranked group any more. We did that nightly for the past 3 years.

Guy is telling solo players not to complain, not responding to original post if you read the thread of comments carefully. Also dynamic players should care about this too bc dynamic rank won't mean shit until 5s comes back bc 5s that want to play and have elo gaps are now forced to have the higher elo players smurf in order to play together and it is going to inflate a good number of dynamic account ranks.

Except the guy you are criticizing for saying not to complain about a new mode is responding to someone complaining about not liking to play as the only SOLO stuck with a group of 4. If he is upset about dynamic as a solo player then it makes sense to rebuke him for complaining bc we have a solo option still (albeit delayed release).

The people who should be upset are ranked 5s players of large elo gaps, and dynamic players who will be forced to go against teams with smurfs significantly more often because that is now the only way high elo players can play a more serious ranked environment with low elo friends if they want to avoid normals. Basically large gap teams get shafted, and dynamic que gets shafted because there will be inflated elo in dynamic bc of teams with smurfs but not in solo, thus rank in dynamic won't mean much until 5s comes back out. Solo players shouldn't be complaining bc we have it the best of anyone in the community right now and there is no need to rub it in other players faces.

>They are giving you the queue you wanted, now is the time to say thank you


"You got fucked up, but as a consolidation prize, you get what you had from the very beggining, and you're supposed to be thankfull about it."

Are you serious?

Fuck that shit, I was born with the capacity of critical thought, you do you though.

Lets get this straight.  Riot wanted to replace solo/duo queue with dynamic queue.  People said it was bad.  Riot realized they have a point and decided to offer a dedicated ranked solo queue as well as the new dynamic queue.  And you guys are still complaining.

WHAT DO YOU WANT THEM TO DO NOW?

The point of giving feedback is so they can change things.  If there is absolutely nothing you want them to change anymore, why are you still complaining?

They wanted to fix what wasn't broken to begin with, and they fucked up. Not as hard as they've fucked up other things, but it still didn't really work.

And as expected, there was backlash. And Riot decided "you know what, let's give them back soloQ".

What? Wait what?! Wasn't the point to replace SoloQ with DynamicQ all together? What the fuck?! And now you just give us back a recolored SoloQ? What the actual fuck?!
I already told you Riot, I don't want to be that solo player playing in a matchup with 2 groups of 4-man premades duking it out, I already fucking told you. Even if it happens in 98% of games, that's still 2% of 20million games at any given hour. That's 400.000 fucking unacceptable games. I don't GIVE A SINGLE DAMN FUCK how low the percentage is, with the amount of games we're dealing with, the number is still massive for as long as we're not speaking in decimals.

No, no booboo. I won't say thank you for that. Don't let that stop you from being you though.

And the drawback will be that people in the Solo Q won't be getting ranked rewards.

On the other hand Dynamic queue will die for everybody, but 5 man premades, because there will be nobody to fill the gaps.

Lose-lose situation by PhD Lyte and his sidekicks.

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZMr8OYtf,comment-id=0001000000000003,timestamp=2016-01-21T15:15:16.864+0000)

> And the drawback will be that people in the Solo Q won't be getting ranked rewards.

Where did you get this information?  I would be very surprised if this were true.  And without that drawback there is no reason to complain about the dynamic queue when you don't have to use it.
Lyte said in the Dynamic Queue feedback thread, that most rewards will be shifted from solo and team ranked to Dynamic Queue.

It may have less to do with us getting the queue we wanted and more to do with it being delayed in favor of the queue that was never actually asked for.

The original solo-queue was removed in favor of a hack-job, amateur queue already proven to be flawed in another game and is now delayed on its return for... what reason?  Dynamic queue is a middle-ground compromise queue that is currently trying to cover for two different ends of a spectrum when it cannot possibly do either to any decent extent.

If you want to thank Riot for basically removing the functionality from the game, then be so kind as to thank them for Morde's rework as well.  Maybe Cass's also.  How about the Sej nerfs?  We got everything we wanted out of all of those, didn't we?
Soloq is coming back.  And unless I am mistaken ranked 5s was never intended to be dropped, it just isn't offered on the first day.  So no functionality will be lost.

> [{quoted}](name=For Carthage,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZMr8OYtf,comment-id=0001000000000002,timestamp=2016-01-21T04:38:10.891+0000)
>
> It may have less to do with us getting the queue we wanted and more to do with it being **delayed in favor of the queue that was never actually asked for.**

New stuff is fun. New stuff is fine if it's needed. This wasn't what ranked needed and countless threads were made pointing out clear issues and what could be done to fix them.  Instead, Riot fixed one or two of those issues with new champ select and the rest of them they said, "So instead of actually fixing anything, we've instead just offered an alternative that has its own problems but hey, you can either hate your teammates or hate the game, soooooo~."

> [{quoted}](name=For Carthage,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZMr8OYtf,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-01-20T21:35:58.420+0000)
>
> Or they could, you know...
> 
> Not have the idiotic fucking dynamic queue that's completely counter-intuitive.  I stopped playing HotS for several reasons - one of them being because I got really tired of being the one solo player on a team with a 4-man pre-made.  Welcome to being basically an entirely separate entity from the rest of the game - you've at that point practically become a single player team thanks to the 4-man not communicating, helping, or even acknowledging you up until they appear to be losing.  Then welcome to Blameville.
> 
> Just... fuck dynamic queue.  So hard.

A thousand times this.

This has been updated. The Ranked queues for this season will be DynaQ and Solo. 5s is defunct, as you can build a team of 5 in DynaQ and apparently the odds of getting matched against another premade 5 are above 95%

> [{quoted}](name=Goosetard,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZMr8OYtf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-20T19:08:30.198+0000)
>
> From what I read on this thread: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/HGblb9fH-the-2016-ranked-season-updates-on-dynamic-ranked-and-your-feedback
> They're going to re-integrate ranked 5s at some point into the queue system, they just had to change plans because they're rolling out a dedicated soloq ASAP, which was a last-minute change.

i dont see where thats stated anywhere in that thread....could you quote or point it out?
"the Ranked Teams queue skips the 2016 season while we begin work to integrate the full team experience into Dynamic Ranked. Expect more details about improved organized play later in the year"

> [{quoted}](name=Goosetard,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZMr8OYtf,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2016-01-22T00:52:44.101+0000)
>
> "the Ranked Teams queue skips the 2016 season while we begin work to integrate the full team experience into Dynamic Ranked. Expect more details about improved organized play later in the year"

ahh thank you!

The more queues they make, the more people will be spread out between all of them.

Meaning: Longer queue times.

Be careful what you wish for.

But people like to talk like you could create 500 different queues and players would spawn from nowhere for them.

I'd rather not have team 5v5 ranked, than have it and be paired against plat/silvers or having to wait 15 mins per game.

The ranked 5's is infuriating. I finally got my team to diamond 1 then they delete it for this season.

Screw riot

> [{quoted}](name=Balthid,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZMr8OYtf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-20T19:06:55.377+0000)
>
> The ranked 5's is infuriating. I finally got my team to diamond 1 then they delete it for this season.
> 
> Screw riot

Ummm... what?  Everyone's rating was reset, this has nothing to do with Dynamic Queueing.
They want everyone playing the same 3modes. All shall conform.

> [{quoted}](name=Master Nami,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZMr8OYtf,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-20T19:08:41.295+0000)
>
> They want everyone playing the same 3modes. All shall conform.

Poor TT and Dominion :(

Riot while this is obviously a sarcastic and critical approach, PLEASE RESPOND TO THIS.

Our team has played and beaten teams with two diamonds, another with four plats, others more similar ranks to us. For six years we've played and loved league, spent hundreds, built a community.

Now to appease some, you've removed the main source of enjoyment for others. Please at least extend the "one rank" of each other to two or three.

I am not exaggerating to say this change will be the difference between playing or not playing this game with any regularity. Please at least give some feedback on why this was seen as a positive. We don't want to have to play solo Dynamic Queue to be able to play (in essence) Ranked 5s like we always have. 
(This section copied from other of my posts regarding this subject)

> [{quoted}](name=Chovy152,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZMr8OYtf,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-01-21T00:20:30.244+0000)
>
> Riot while this is obviously a sarcastic and critical approach, PLEASE RESPOND TO THIS.
> 
> Our team has played and beaten teams with two diamonds, another with four plats, others more similar ranks to us. For six years we've played and loved league, spent hundreds, built a community.
> 
> Now to appease some, you've removed the main source of enjoyment for others. Please at least extend the "one rank" of each other to two or three.
> 
> I am not exaggerating to say this change will be the difference between playing or not playing this game with any regularity. Please at least give some feedback on why this was seen as a positive. We don't want to have to play solo Dynamic Queue to be able to play (in essence) Ranked 5s like we always have. 
> (This section copied from other of my posts regarding this subject)

So you want diamond level players queuing with gold level players?

YES. I most DEFINITELY do. 

It's the one opportunity I have to see how the excellent players play. And, often, I get the chance to play with and against Diamond/Master tier players, as a gold. And I LOVE the challenge. I have learned more in ranked 5s against highly disparaging game skill than I have BY FAR in soloq.

Yes in Ranked 5s that is not a significant problem. In disorganized Dynamic Queue I'm sure there could be issues but under the previous system organized teams can beat players of significantly higher rank.

> [{quoted}](name=Chovy152,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZMr8OYtf,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2016-01-21T03:01:03.290+0000)
>
> Yes in Ranked 5s that is not a significant problem. In disorganized Dynamic Queue I'm sure there could be issues but **under the previous system organized teams can beat players of significantly higher rank.**

You realise that's how the new system still works, right?  If you're solo queued and you queue up against an organised party, your team's MMR would be significantly higher than the opponents to make up for the communication disparity.

Nothing has changed in that regard.

The change though is we are no longer allowed to rank together Silvers and one Plat (my group consists of 3 Silvers, 1 Gold, and 1 Plat). So something was actually lost. 

The new rule if you weren't aware is: "you can rank with others so long as they are within one tier of you."

Yeah no thanks. That would strip the integrity of the ranks. X420noscopex is a bronze 5 playing with a gold friend in a mostly gold game. There is no explanation that justifies allowing that to happen. You are going to make people miserable for your own satisfaction. The simple answer is to bring back 5's.
Solo Q, because I have no friends :(
People who want to play with friends have normals. It's not fun to have to deal with people that are so much more highly skilled than you.

The skill difference between a Silver and Diamond in solo queue is significantly less impactful than the same difference in Ranked 5s. Team coordination and strategy means a whole lot. People going into Ranked 5s shouldn't be playing like it's solo queue.

So? It's folly to think that a silver facing a diamond in lane is going to have an equal chance of winning that lane. Sure, the silver has friends on skype to help him if he's in trouble, but so does the diamond.

Yes I have to play my ass off to win the lane, but we consistently do it (and obviously lose often as well to both higher and lower ranked players). If uneven skill matchups are a concern, then you can play any other queue. Ranked 5s is about how you strategize and play as a team. 

I agree with you I don't have an equal chance. But the point I'm making is that I want to be able to play with my friends as a ranked team. Never before have you been unable to do this based on rank.

To me, playing as a ranked group is much more important than whether I have to stretch myself to play better and win a hard matchup.

> People who want to play with friends have normals. It's not fun to have to deal with people that are so much more highly skilled than you.

My 5s team consisted of a silver, two or three golds, a plat and a diamond depending on who was online at the time. 
The enemy team ALWAYS had a similar layout to ours, so it was a diamond vs a diamond in some way.

so I spent all of season 5 getting out of bronze 5 it was hard but I slowly climbed my mmr slowly went up and I found a champion I was good at. it was so hard my friends wouldn't play with me because of the people I was matched with but I played and played. I would make it to silver and my friends would play with me again.  I would make it to bronze 4 over and over every week and I would loose 25- 30 for losses and only get 9 for wins but I kept playing. and my mmr climed so eventually it leveled out in B4 I would gain and loose the same lp for wins and losses and I made it to 3 and was climing. I felt better I was placed with better players and I felt it wasn't impossible. it took a whole year to get out of 5 a year. and then I win 7 out of 10 provisional games and it puts me in bronze 5 that I worked so hard to get out of. I'm never playing lol again thank you for making all my efforts usless and crushing my sprit. you suck riot and your system is unfare. GG
You know if you did it once you can do it again and in less than half the time.
I had to play over 800 games to do it
There is no significant difference between Bronze 5 and Bronze 3 in the first place... or even between any Bronze divisions really.
there is a huge difference in play the quality of players you get are crazy different trust me I played enough games in bronze 5 it is awful

I'm looking forward to dynamic queue 
I almost exclusively play mobas with friends.
But between all of us having our post secondary studies + work its almost impossible to get 5 people on at once. For the past 3 years we've been laying 80-90% of it has been in parties of 3-4 . So when we did have 5 why bother doing ranked, we probably wouldn't have enough times  with 5 players to get very far. (Last season we got a couple placement games done) 

Now I will be able to ranked and If i want to go with a friend but have 2 online I don't need to leave one behind.
